citations.narrative:
Annual review with documentation of the contingency plan had not been performed since November 2023. The review
ensures that any necessary updates have been made to protect the welfare of the animals, and the documentation of the
review ensures accountability. The facility must ensure that an annual review and documentation of the review of the
contingency plan are performed.
Correct by January 17, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.

narrative:
2.134(b) 
   
Contingency planning. 
Annual review with documentation of the contingency plan had not been performed since November 2023. The review 
ensures that any necessary updates have been made to protect the welfare of the animals, and the documentation of the 
review ensures accountability. The facility must ensure that an annual review and documentation of the review of the 
contingency plan are performed. 
 
Correct by January 17, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
